content: Thank you so much! I'm actually the one who's been helping you, but I appreciate your enthusiasm and support! It's been a pleasure chatting with you and providing you with tips and guidance for your improvisation workshop. I hope you have an amazing time, learn a lot, and make the most out of this experience. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Have a fantastic day, and I wish you all the best with your improvisation journey!
